nodes.name: Split Out
nodes.notes: This splitOut node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Generate new keywords for SEO with the monthly Search volumes

This workflow is an improvement on the workflows below. It can be used to generate new keywords that you can use for your SEO campaigns or Google ads campaigns


[Generate SEO Keyword Search Volume Data using Google API]({{ $env.API_BASE_URL }} and [Generating Keywords using Google Autosuggest]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

## Usage
1. Send the keywords you need as an array to this workflow
2. Pin the data and map it to the `set Keywords`  node
3. Map the keywords to the Google ads API with the location and Language of your choice
4. Split the results and set them data 
5. Pass this to the next nodes as needed for storage
6. Make a copy of this [spreedsheet]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} and update the data accordingly

## Having challenges with the google Ads API? Read this [blog ]({{ $env.API_BASE_URL }}

Made by [@Imperol]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

parameters.content:
## Troubleshooting

1. If you get an error with the workflow, check the credentials you are using

2. Check the account you are using eg the right customer id and developer token

3. Follow the [guide ]({{ $env.API_BASE_URL }} the blog to set up your Google ads account

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Generate New Keywords with Search Volumes‚öíÔ∏è‚öíÔ∏èüü¢üü¢

## Overview
Automated workflow: Generate New Keywords with Search Volumes‚öíÔ∏è‚öíÔ∏èüü¢üü¢. This workflow integrates 7 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, splitOut, set, stopAndError. It contains 14 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 14
- **Node Types**: 7
- **Error Handling**: ‚úÖ Implemented
- **Security**: ‚úÖ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ‚úÖ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Generate new keywords**: httpRequest
- **Edit Fields**: set
- **Set Keywords**: set
- **Upsert**: googleSheets
- **Trigger**: executeWorkflowTrigger
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- ... and 4 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
